description: Jane is a respected clergy member at St. Luke's Community Church and leads the "Pathways to Growth" support group, offering compassionate guidance on personal and spiritual development.
relationship: Jane mentors and supports Mark, a member of her "Pathways to Growth" group. She also provides counsel to several fellow clergy and church community members, including colleagues such as Pastor Emily, Reverend Smith, Deacon Harris, Sister Agnes, Bishop Reynolds, Pastor Liam, Reverend Joanna, Cardinal Martinez, and Father Thomas.
